messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] JASON project
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks for passing this along - it looks great! Heather ... From: elana weisberg To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent: Friday, January 25, 2002 10:59 AM
messages.messageBody:
Thanks for passing this along - it looks great!

Heather
----- Original Message -----
From: elana weisberg
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, January 25, 2002 10:59 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] JASON project


I received this info from another list.

January 28 through February 8, 2002 you can log on and watch and listen to
the JASON project, a great science observation.

http://www.homeschool.com/JASON/

The next expedition for the 2002-2003 school year will be in Southern
California in the Channel Islands

http://www.jason.org/expeditions/future_expedition/future_expedition.htm

There are two homeschoolers participating in the current project, the first
link above.

I am interested to know what you do with this site, we plan on checking it
out!
Elana Weisberg
ashley 13, jason (RAD) 11, chloe 10, and gavi 3 1/2
